markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=1641)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 351 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You ward a creature against harm. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** You can choose to have the benefits also affect all your allies in a 10-foot emanation around the target.
name: Protection

<summary>

</summary>
text: Protection Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 351 2.0 Traditions Divine, Occult Range touch Target 1 willing creature Duration 1 minute --- You ward a creature against harm. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws. --- Heightened (3rd) You can choose to have the benefits also affect all your allies in a 10-foot emanation around the target.
